meanings.definition: A white, crystalline amino acid found in proteins.
meanings.sent1: The leucin in the protein powder helps build muscles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how leucin interacts with other amino acids in the body.
meanings.sent3: The leucin and other amino acids had a party in the protein shake.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the bond between leucin and proteins.
meanings.sent5: The importance of leucin in muscle growth cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: A type of amino acid that is essential for human nutrition.
meanings.sent1: Our bodies need leucin to function properly.
meanings.sent2: Leucin is one of the amino acids that our bodies cannot produce on their own.
meanings.sent3: The leucin in the meal was like the missing piece of a puzzle for her health.
meanings.sent4: His love for fitness was as essential to him as leucin is to our bodies.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of leucin in our diet are crucial for our well-being.
